title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1412/92 of 27 May 1992 fixing for the 1992/93 marketing year the Community offer prices for lemons applicable with regard to Spain and Portugal
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1412/92  of 27 May 1992  fixing for the 1992/93 marketing year the Community offer prices for lemons applicable with regard to Spain and Portugal
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1992/93 marketing year, the Community offer prices for lemons (CN code 0805 30 10) applicable with regard to Spain and Portugal, expressed in ecus per 100 kilograms net of packed products of class I, of all sizes, shall be as follows:
- June: 40,82
- July and August: 50,65
- September: 56,23
- October: 47,99
- November to April: 38,93
- May: 36,37.
This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 June 1992. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 May 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
